name: The Transmute
description:
Developed by Hades and adc for the UDC Jam 13 and the DOS Games Jam in under nine days. Inspired by Alone in the Dark developed by Infogrames/Atari SA. It is the 2nd of November 1989.

An unknown nameless ship has struck the coast of a remote island, it's origin, purpose and structure remain shrouded in mystery, with the only few willing to investigate either run out of cowardice or get consumed by whatever force resides in the ship. You play as a daring skeptic on his way to unearth whatever horrifying secrets lie within the surface of the ship. Whether he will survive is up to you.

THIS GAME SUPPORTS CONTROLLERS FOR BOTH XBOX AND PLAYSTATION.

The WebGL version of this game is an experimental version, please download the Windows executable for a better experience.

CONTROLS:

KEYBOARD/MOUSE:

MoveWASDSprintSHIFTActionSPACE / ENTERCancelCTRLInventoryX / IPauseESCToggle LightTAB / M

CONTROLLER: (XBOX / PLAYSTATION)

MoveLEFT ANALOG STICK / D-PADSprint( X ) BUTTON / ( SQUARE ) BUTTONAction( A ) BUTTON / ( CROSS ) BUTTONCancel( B ) BUTTON / ( CIRCLE ) BUTTONInventoryBACK / TOUCH PADPauseSTARTToggle Light( Y ) BUTTON / ( TRIANGLE) BUTTON

HINTS:

  • Don't run all the time.
  • The eye icon indicates whether you're being detected.
  • If enemies are nearby, walk or wait until you can't hear them anymore.
  • Turning off lights makes you harder to detect.
